author: slava77
body:
- D60 workflows are added to the map; this is needed starting CMSSW_11_2_X_2020-07-14-2300 for proper running of reco comparisons in the standard jenkins tests 
- chi2 variables are added, in connection with cms-sw/cmssw#30566
title: reco comparisons updates: new map, chi2 variables for HI
